entry.title: Simple crawling with Mac
entry.content: Use Mac to perform simple crawling. 123456789101112131415161718# -*- coding:UTF-8 -*-from bs4 import BeautifulSoupimport requestsif __name__ == "__main__": target = 'https://blog.csdn.net/qq_40616487/article/details/79959264' req = requests.get(url = target) html = req.text bf = BeautifulSoup(html, "html.parser") article = bf.find_all('div', class_ = 'htmledit_views') article = article[0].text.replace('\xa0', '\n') #print(article)fo = open('Simple_crawling_with_Mac.txt', "ab+")print("'Use Mac to perform simple crawling' to start downloading:")fo.write(('\r' + article + '\r\n').encode('UTF-8')) fo.close()print("'Simple Crawling with Mac' download completed.")

entry.title: Python_crawler_eth
entry.content:
ETH Address/Txhash. 1234567891011121314151617181920# -*- coding:UTF-8 -*-from itertools import islice #https://blog.csdn.net/xiaocaiju/article/details/6968123from bs4 import BeautifulSoupimport requestsif __name__ == "__main__": server = 'https://etherscan.io' target = 'https://etherscan.io/address/0xf075ade7cF89637860005288d60f697026755E74' req = requests.get(url = target) html = req.text a_div = BeautifulSoup(html, "html.parser") a = a_div.find_all('a', class_ = 'address-tag') #for each in islice(a, 0, None, 2): for each in islice(a, 1, None, 2): fo = open('YLH_ETH_add.txt', "ab+") fo.write(('' + each.string + '
').encode('UTF-8')) fo.write((server + each.get('href') + '
').encode('UTF-8')) fo.close() #print(each.string +'
', server + each.get('href')+'

') print('TxHash Download Completeds.')

entry.title: Learn Python
entry.content: 12print "Hello, world!"print "Waterâ€”there is not a drop of water there! Were Niagara but a cataract of sand, would you travel your thousand miles to see it?"

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new postClick-code-block 1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
